welcome.title: <0><1>Radarin</1></0>
welcome.description: <0>Radarin allows you to locate and meet up with your friends in a quick and easy way. Here you can:</0>
welcome.libraryList: <0><0>Add new people to your friend list or detele existing ones.</0><1>Visualize friends on you area.</1><1>Show as well, your own location to your friends.</1></0>
welcome.fairUsageText: The Radarin app is being developed by
welcome.fairUsageExamples: <0><0> Rubén Pardiño Iglesias.</0><1>Victor Suárez Sierra.</1><2>Miguel Menéndez Rodríguez.</2><0>Álvaro de la Fuente Fernández.</0><1>Ramón Vila Ferreres.</1><2>Fabio Cuartas Puente.</2><0>Israel Méndez Rodríguez.</0></0>
welcome.fairUsageSummary: All part of the group radarin_es4a from the Software Architecture subject of School of Computer Science Engineering (University of Oviedo).
welcome.contactUsText: <0>If you have additional questions about Radarin, please contact <1>support@radarin.com<1>.</0>
welcome.evolvingMessage: <0>This application is currently under development. We are following the principles of the <1>SOLID proyect</1>, prioritizing the user's privacy and not storing any personal data.</0>
welcome.implementing: This latest release builds on the prior versions:
welcome.version010: <0><0><0>Internationalization</0> best practices, with application session language selection.</0><0>Ability to update your profile image on the Welcome page.</0> </0>
welcome.version030: <0><0>Implementing the ability to view and edit your <1>User Profile</1></0><1>Including an Application Footer that displays the build number and links to resources.</1><2>Addressing several minor issues based on user feedback.</2></0>

editor.explanation: This simple text editor enables you to create a plaintext file and save it in a Pod. To make this very clear for the demo you provide a URL as an absolute path to the file in the Pod. The Pod can be the one this App has been logged into or another person's Pod. To write, and read, into another person's Pod the owner will have had to provide you with write permission.
